items.todoItem: Know that Paul was chosen by God to be sent out as an ambassador of Jesus Christ.
Know that we are called to be saints.
Know that as far as God is concerned you are a saint.
Don’t put yourself down: God has elevated you to sainthood.
Know that our faith has brought us into Christ Jesus and the body of Christ.
Know that God’s Word is directly addressed to each of us as faithful believers.
Take note that it was Paul’s desire that the saints receive yet more of God’s grace and peace.
Know that grace and peace come from God our Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
Remember that Jesus is the Prince of Peace.
Know that God is our Father.
Know that the Lord Jesus Christ is equally divine with God the Father.
Know that Jesus is Lord.
Know that Jesus is saviour.
Know that Jesus is the Messiah.
Give praise to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Know that God is worthy of praise.
Know that God is the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Know that Jesus is God’s Son.
Know that God has a Son whose name is Jesus Christ.
Know that we are blessed with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ.
Thank God for your spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ.
Know that we were chosen by God in Christ before the creation of the world.
Know that in Christ we are holy and blameless before God in love.
Know that God sees us in our perfected state: clothed in the righteousness of His Son.
See yourself as God sees you in Christ and know how completely He loves you.
Know that God preordained us to be adopted as children of God by Jesus Christ.
Know that it was the good pleasure of God’s will to adopt us as His children.
Know that God is gracious.
Know that our adoption is to the praise of the glory of His grace.
Praise the glory of God’s grace.
Know that Jesus is God’s beloved Son.
Know that God has made us accepted in His beloved Son Jesus.
Know that our acceptance comes only from being in His beloved Son Jesus.
Know that our acceptance in Christ does not come from any good works we have done.
Know that God will not and cannot accept us apart from Jesus.
Know that our acceptance brings us into the family of God.
Know that we have been redeemed through the blood of Jesus.
Know that we are bought with a price: the precious blood of Jesus.
Know that our sins are forgiven through the ransom blood of Jesus.
Know that God has lavished the riches of His grace upon us.
Know that God has lavished wisdom and understanding upon us through the abundant riches of His grace.
Know that God’s grace abounds toward us.
Know that God has chosen to make known to us the mystery of His will.
Know that it was the good pleasure of God to make the mystery of His will known to us.
Know that it pleases God to reveal His will to His children.
Know that God does as He pleases to fulfill His purposes.
Know that in the fullness of time God will gather together all things in heaven and on earth in Christ.
Know that God has positioned His Son Jesus Christ at the centre of His plans.
Know that we were predestined to obtain an inheritance in Christ by God’s will.
Know that we were predestined to be part of God’s purpose and plan.
Know that in Christ you have become a child and heir of God.
Know that God works all things after the counsel of His own will.
Know that God is sovereign, having supreme power and authority to rule as He wills.
Know that God takes counsel from His own will.
Know that God does not need advice from anybody.
Know that we were predestinated to the praise of His glory.
Live for the praise of His glory.
Know that your trust is now in Christ after you heard the word of truth.
Know that the word of truth became the gospel of your salvation.
Know that you were sealed with the Holy Spirit of promise after you believed.
Know that the Holy Spirit is God’s seal of ownership upon us.
Know that the Holy Spirit is a down payment (pledge) of our inheritance until the redemption of our body.
Know that our possession of the Holy Spirit is for the praise of God’s glory.
Know that you are a purchased possession of the Lord.
Know that we have been purchased by the blood of Jesus and are now in His possession.
Know that faith in Jesus and love of the saints go hand-in-hand.
Give thanks and pray for your brothers and sisters in Christ.
Give thanks for those you know who have come to faith and make mention of them in your prayers.
Know that God is the Father of glory.
Pray for the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of God.
Pray that your understanding may be enlightened to know the hope and certainty of His calling.
Pray that you may know and understand the riches of the glory of His inheritance in the body of Christ.
Pray that you may know and experience His great and miraculous power that is given to believers.
Know that God wants to demonstrate His mighty power through us so that He might receive glory.
Know that God raised Jesus from the dead.
Know that God demonstrated the exceeding greatness of His power when He raised Jesus from the dead.
Know that God has set Jesus at His own right hand in heaven.
Know that Jesus is set far above every power and name in this world and that which is to come.
Know that there is a world to come after this world.
Know that God has put all things under the feet of Jesus.
Know that God has set Jesus as head over all things to the church.
Know that the church is the living body of Jesus on earth.
Know that the church is the fulfilment of Jesus that accomplishes everything through everyone in the body of Christ.
